ngiemboon: Cʉ̀apʉ̀a la gɔɔn né mèŋ ngie: «Gʉa ńjú kwɔb gẅie mé la lɔgɔ tʉ̀nzẅìŋ sìsyè ḿbáʼ, ńtʉ́me zẅɛ̌ʼ gù; táʼ, pɔ́ɔn léké sɔg.»
en: This is what the Lord said to me: “Go and buy yourself a linen undergarment   and put it on.  # 13:1 Lit around your waist But do not put it in water.”

ngiemboon: Cʉ̀apʉ̀a la tsẅi púʼu, n gʉa ńjú kwɔb ŋwɛ́, ńtʉ́me zẅɛ̌ʼ mèŋ.
en: So I bought underwear as the Lord instructed me and put it on.

ngiemboon: Cʉ̀apʉ̀a gɔɔn né mèŋ ngie:
en: Then the word of the Lord came to me a second time:

ngiemboon: Kyɛ́ʼ kwɔb gẅie ɔ̀ ka jǔ ńtʉ́me zẅɛ̌ʼ gù lɛ̂, ńdɔg ńgʉa ncwò mí Efelad, ńdeʼe mvwɔ̀ʼ tóon gie ee wó.
en: “Take the underwear that you bought and are wearing,   and go at once to the Euphrates  # 13:4–7 Perhaps a place near Anathoth with the same spelling as the river and hide it in a rocky crevice.”  # 13:4 Jr 51:63

ngiemboon: Cʉ̀apʉ̀a la tsẅi púʼu, n gwoon ńgʉa mí Efelad, ńdeʼe kwɔb ŋwɛ́.
en: So I went and hid it by the Euphrates, as the Lord commanded me.

ngiemboon: Etsɔ́ tyé fʉ̀ʼ la gÿo ńgwɔ́, Cʉ̀apʉ̀a tsẅi né mèŋ ngie: «Piŋe ncwò mí Efelad, ḿbí kwɔb gẅie n da tsẅi ngie ɔ̀ leʼe wó la.»
en: A long time later the Lord said to me, “Go at once to the Euphrates and get the underwear that I commanded you to hide there.”

ngiemboon: Ńtsẅi púʼu, m biŋe ncwò mí Efelad, ńgʉa ḿbí kwɔb jʉʼ gie n da leʼe wó. Táʼ, n da pí kwɔb, ńgyá mbà é pǔ ńdʉ́, tà ngwɔ́ é le gíŋe ńkẅéte wɔ́.
en: So I went to the Euphrates and dug up the underwear and got it from the place where I had hidden it, but it was ruined #— #of no use at all.

ngiemboon: Á la gwɔ́ púʼu, Cʉ̀apʉ̀a gɔɔn né mèŋ ngie:
en: Then the word of the Lord came to me:

ngiemboon: Mèŋ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a ne ńgɔɔn ngie: Wɔɔn aa páʼ n ge gÿo pyága ŋáʼtè pʉ̀a Yúndà lâ máa ŋáʼtè pʉ̀a Yelúzálèm púʼu.
en: “This is what the Lord says: Just like this I will ruin the great pride of both Judah and Jerusalem.

ngiemboon: Á zɔɔn ńgwaa gwɔ́, epʉ̀a láʼ ŋwɛ́ gwɔ́ pɔ́ pʉ̀a tepòŋ. Pɔ́ lʉʼʉ léjúʼ ncwò wɔ́ɔn. Pɔ́ gÿo pɔ́ mmó gie á kẅɛɛ twó pɔ́b. Pɔ́ cʉŋe pɔ́ na tsɔ́ messé; éfaʼa mbwó pɔ́b, ḿbiŋe ńguʼte wɔ́b. Púʼu la, á ne ńzɛ́te ngie epʉ̀a yɔɔn láʼ ŋwɛ́, e cʉ́ʼ ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ páʼ wɔɔn kwɔb gẅie ngwɔ́ mé le gíŋe ńdɔg ńgÿo tsɔ́ mmó wɔ́!
en: These evil people, who refuse to listen to me, who follow the stubbornness of their own hearts,   and who have followed other gods to serve and bow in worship #— #they will be like this underwear, of no use at all.

ngiemboon: N da la nnɛ́ na tsìŋendá Ésàlayɛ mbɔɔ na ye Yúndà ntsèm, páʼ nyìŋ mbàŋa tʉ́me kwɔb zẅɛ̌ʼ ye la. N da ne ńtsɔ́ɔn ngie pɔ́ cʉ́ʼ pʉ̀a pɔ́ɔn, ńgÿo lezíŋ sɔ́ɔn e fáŋ, ńnáa wɔ́ɔn legúʼ, ńgwɔ́ wɔ̀ɔn lekág. Táʼ, pɔ́ la te ncwò wɔ́ɔn júʼ. Cʉ̀apʉ̀a zɔ gɔɔn.
en: Just as underwear clings to one’s waist, so I fastened the whole house of Israel and of Judah to me”    #— #this is the Lord’s declaration #— #“so that they might be my people for my fame, praise, and glory,  # 13:11 Dt 26:19; Ezk 16:8–14 but they would not obey.

ngiemboon: Cʉ̀apʉ̀a la gíŋe ńgɔɔn né Yelemî ngie: «Ɔ̀ ge gɔɔn né pɔ́b ngie: anò gie Cʉ̀apʉ̀a, é Ssé Ésàlayɛ gɔ̌ɔn á yɔɔn: mé nyɛte ntúʼ lélɔg ńnéŋ melùʼ. Ńgwɔ́ gie pɔ́ lɔɔn ńtsɔ́ʼ ngie, áa kwaʼ púʼu, peg ne ńzsé,
en: “Say this to them: ‘This is what the Lord, the God of Israel, says: Every jar should be filled with wine.’ Then they will respond to you, ‘Don’t we know that every jar should be filled with wine? ’

ngiemboon: mbà ɔ̀ ge shwóŋo wɔ́b ngie: Cʉ̀apʉ̀a gɔ̌ɔn ngie: “N ge pú lɔg pʉ̀a wɔɔn ngwòŋ, é gÿo mepʉ̀a melùʼ, n gɔɔn mefùɔ pie é néŋe na lʉŋe lefùɔ Ndavîd, ńgɔɔn panuŋepwɔʼ, ńgɔɔn pantsẅìnkʉ̀ Ssé mbɔɔ pʉ̀a pie é pú ńtsẅé Yelúzálèm.
en: And you will say to them, ‘This is what the Lord says: I am about to fill all who live in this land #— #the kings who reign for David on his throne, the priests, the prophets, and all the residents of Jerusalem #— #with drunkenness.

ngiemboon: É gÿo púʼu, é maʼa fagte tsetsɛ̀ɛ pɔ́b, pɔ́ lÿo mennɛ́ mɔ́b, é gÿo tá múɔ pɔ́ múɔ le júʼe. Mèŋ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a zɔ gɔɔn. N ge gÿo pyága nyìŋ té vʉʼʉ tsɔ̌. N te gÿo gẅiin pòŋontʉ́m wɔ́, é ké le gẅiin tsɔ́ɔnmezìŋe wɔ́. Atsɔ́ mmó té gÿo táte wɔ́ɔn lépyága wɔ́b wɔ́.”»
en: I will smash them against each other, fathers and sons alike #— #this is the Lord’s declaration. I will allow no mercy, pity, or compassion to keep me from destroying them.’ ”

ngiemboon: Pi tʉ́ŋe tuŋó gí, ńjúʼ,
en: Listen and pay attention. Do not be proud,

ngiemboon: Pi guʼte Cʉ̀apʉ̀a Ssé gí,
en: Give glory to the  Lord your God

ngiemboon: Pi lɔɔn ńké té júʼu yɔɔn nò gie
en: But if you will not listen,

ngiemboon: Cʉ̀apʉ̀a gɔɔn né Yelemî ngie:
en: Say to the king and the queen mother:

ngiemboon: Mé kéen ḿbú ńjÿɔ́ʼ mencwò nkáʼa
en: The cities of the Negev are under siege;

ngiemboon: Epʉ̀a Yelúzálèm, pi pʉʼʉ nÿɔ́g mí, ńdíe ńgyá;
en: Look up and see

ngiemboon: Pi ka gÿo, etsɔ́ pʉ̀a
en: What will you say when he appoints

ngiemboon: À cʉa púʼu, pi zɛ́te ngie:
en: And when you ask yourself,

ngiemboon: Tà à lɔɔn ngwɔ́ nyìŋ Etíyopìa kúbe
en: Can the Cushite change his skin,

ngiemboon: N ge tága gẅí,
en: I will scatter you   like drifting chaff  # 13:24 Jb 13:25; Ps 83:13; Is 40:24

ngiemboon: Epʉ̀a Yelúzálèm, yɔɔn áa nò gie á ge gÿo gẅí,
en: This is your lot,

ngiemboon: N ge gÿo pʉʼʉ menzsǒ mí é lɔg kábte shÿó gẅí,
en: I will pull your skirts up over your face

ngiemboon: Wɛ̌ɛ, n gyǎ nò gÿɛ́ gí,
en: Your adulteries and your lustful neighing,
